item.description:
You've had your head in the clouds dreaming of uplifting Alpine Adventures for long enough --

Finally take the plunge: Drop $79 for a Treetop Canopy Tour, including six zip lines with three suspension bridges.

Thrilling visitors since 1997, this White Mountains adventure crew -- based in Lincoln -- is ranked number-one among local tour companies on TripAdvisor and boasts numerous awards, including Yankee Magazine's "Best of New England" 2012 pick. Start with a gentle ground takeoff into the forest; glide from tree to tree; and, soar 60 feet high on ziplines up to 1,000 feet in length. Then, traverse a 75-foot-long suspension bridge across the Barron Gorge, and end your 2.5-hour adrenaline rush with an optional 40-mph free fall -- a charge sure to leave you feeling on top of the world.

*Important*For the safety of our guests and guides, all zipline participants must meet the weight & height restrictions for each tour (No Taller than 6'5 and less than 230 lbs). We will weigh participants if needed and those outside of the weight range will not be allowed to participate and no refunds will be issued. All participants need to be relatively physically fit as there is some hiking, stair climbing and descending. All courses have a weight and height restrictions and an age recommendation. If anyone in your party is very sensitive to heights, we would suggest starting with the Treetop Canopy Tour for your first zipline experience, though both tours will reach extreme heights.

change
item.name: ZipLining Adventure
